org.webcurator.domain.model.core
Class Notification

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.domain.model.core.Notification

public class Notification
extends java.lang.Object

represents the Notification details in the system. A notification is a message sent to an individual to inform them of what has happened. A Notification requires no direct action.

Author:
bprice
